div.p: N-CQDs were used for the detection of Ag + in aqueous solution. ( a) Fluorescence intensity of N-CQDs at different concentrations of Ag +; ( b) fluorescence quenching efficiency of N-CQDs at different concentrations of Ag +. In the figure, F 0 is the fluorescence intensity of N-CQDs; F is the fluorescence intensity of N-CQDs when different concentrations of Ag + are added; (F 0 âˆ’ F)/F 0 is the fluorescence quenching efficiency of N-CQDs.
